text: badasahe kahyum. He stri'o! Te samayani saci vata sum che? Jyare tame yukti kari yusuphane teni manani icchathi hatavava mangata hata, teni'o spasta javaba apyo ke “allahani panaha” ame yusuphamam ko'i bura'i nathi jo'i, pachi to ajhijhani patni pana boli ke have saci vata avi ga'i, mem ja tene temana ja lalaca api hati ane kharekhara te saca loko manthi che
